Control Name: Identifies Confidential information—Procedures are in place to identify and designate confidential information when it is received or created and to determine the period over which the confidential information is to be retained.

control_attributes.Control: Identifies Confidential information—Procedures are in place to identify and designate confidential information when it is received or created and to determine the period over which the confidential information is to be retained.
control_attributes.SubCategory: C1.1 The entity identifies and maintains confidential information to meet the entity’s objectives related to confidentiality.
